attributes.title: HELP!!!!!
attributes.review:
After downloading the app, my phone caught on fire yes ON FIRE and you may be asking how well let me tell you...
so when I open the app I felt my phone getting very hot I didn’t think much about it but after using the app for a while it happened my phone caught on FIRE I had to get a NEW PHONE what can I do about this

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: The app is the slowest app I have ever been on and it take weeks to download. Overall I think it is one of the worst apps on the whole planet. I really believe it should be taken down!! It broke my phone completely and I had to get a NEW phone!!! I would never recommend to anyone!!!!! Worse app ever!!!!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!!!
attributes.review: not only does this app take up a TREMENDOUS amount of storage space, it’s made my phone crash SEVERAL times and SIGNIFICANTLY drained my battery. every time i went to open the app, it’s crashed! there have been NUMEROUS times were my phone jus crashed and completely restarted. i can’t stress enough how RIDICULOUSLY annoying this is. NEVER GET THIS APP!!

attributes.title: Gross app
attributes.review: I thought it was a trump app but when I opened it all I saw was a orange roach. So like no thank you. Might as well cancel this app because it’s so useless. We gotta bring back Obama. This app was actually bad and terrible. No buttons were working uhm it took like hours just to click so like hehe no thanks. Might as well cancel this app.

attributes.title: TAKE DOWN THIS APP
attributes.review: this app took three weeks to download, it has made my phone glitch, crashes many of my apps, I have also experienced something I never experienced in my life the sound of the app attracted water bugs in my entire house to the point I am now homeless and has no were to go THIS IS A TERRIBLE APP THAT  NEEDS TO HE DELETED!!

attributes.title: Scary😳✨
attributes.review: So i wanted to know what all the hype was🥵 n i open it n this really scare orange is there😳n i nearly throw my phone across the room😼so scary n ugly wouldn’t recommend 🤬🤬🤬 n also they had a this flag that looked something like 🇱🇷 or🇲🇾 like ALL COUNTRIES MATTER 😡 n it was very selfish of them n I’m very offended 🤩and btw cancel trump 2020🤪 n y’all r CLOWNS🤡 for supporting him anyways luv y’all xoxo💕💕

attributes.title: A disappointment
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of up to date facts on his campaign and the election. When I opened it I was sad but not surprised to see so much racist propaganda. The way the app is set up is a complete disappointment. It already terrible in set up but the content is so bad no matter how it is displayed it will never be good.

attributes.title: if i could leave a zero I WOULD🙄😾😾😾
attributes.review: 0/10 do not recommend, it took me years to download the app and all it shows is a map of Australia??!?! why would i need this information of a fictional land. This man  is trying to spread false rumors about places that aren’t real and sayinf they are real !!! get this app off the app store IMMEDIATELY 😾😾🤬

attributes.title: THIS APP IS CURSED
attributes.review: i opened it and realized they were planning to take down tiktok which is the only source of happiness for gen z and will take away so many jobs. this is war now. give us our app and we’ll give u back urs;) also the app is terribly made and plays a song that makes cockroaches come from your basement.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!
attributes.review: This app took FOREVER to download and when it did it made my phone glitch uncontrollably! I brought it to the Apple store and they had said the app had downloaded tons of viruses and some of them could track me!!! Overall this is a terrible app and I had to delete it off my phone.
